sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import '../../styles/scss/theme.scss';
import t from '../../i18n';
import {Row, Col} from 'react-grid-system';
import { PropsTable, Playground } from 'docz'
import { Text } from '../src/index';

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"entry"}}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="h1">{`Entry`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>

<PropsTable of={Text} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"text-entry"}}>{`Text Entry`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"exemplo-simples"}}>{`Exemplo Simples`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={1} __code={`<Text label={t\`common.label\`} placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`} />`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,t,Row,Col,Text}}>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"exemplos-label"}}>{`Exemplos Label`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={2} __code={`<Row>
  <Col md={4}>
    <Text label={t\`common.label\`} placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`} />
  </Col>
  <Col md={4}>
    <Text label placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`} />
  </Col>

  <Col md={4}>
    <Text placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`} />
  </Col>
</Row>`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,t,Row,Col,Text}}>
  <Row>
    <Col md={4}>
      <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`}/>
    </Col>
<Col md={4}>
  <Text  label placeholder={t`common.placeholder`}/>
</Col>

<Col md={4}>
  <Text  placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} />
</Col>
  </Row>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"exemplos-disabled"}}>{`Exemplos Disabled`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={3} __code={`<Text label={t\`common.label\`} placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`} disabled />`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,t,Row,Col,Text}}>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} disabled/>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"exemplos-width"}}>{`Exemplos Width`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={4} __code={`<Text
  label={t\`common.label\`}
  placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`}
  width="50%"
/>
<Text
  label={t\`common.label\`}
  placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`}
  width="392px"
/>
<Text
  label={t\`common.label\`}
  placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`}
  width="49rem"
/>`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,t,Row,Col,Text}}>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} width='50%'/>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} width='392px'/>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} width='49rem'/>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"exemplos-icon"}}>{`Exemplos Icon`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __codesandbox={`undefined`} __position={5} __code={`<Text
  label={t\`common.label\`}
  placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`}
  iconLeft="fas fa-cloud"
/>
<Text
  label={t\`common.label\`}
  placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`}
  iconRight="fas fa-cloud"
/>
<Text
  label={t\`common.label\`}
  placeholder={t\`common.placeholder\`}
  iconRight="fas fa-cloud"
  iconLeft="fas fa-cloud"
/>`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,t,Row,Col,Text}}>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} iconLeft="fas fa-cloud"/>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} iconRight="fas fa-cloud"/>
    <Text label={t`common.label`} placeholder={t`common.placeholder`} iconRight="fas fa-cloud" iconLeft="fas fa-cloud"/>
</Playground>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
